author: StevenTheBrick
title: Gobbol
review:
4/5

 

Great building experience as the Mixel team gave a lot of life to a dumpster of all things. Ok parts used for the build of Gobbol. Good playability from the wheels as legs, or the mouth opening and being able to store objects inside. This leads to a good value in $5, which is a shame as "Mixels" had excellent Mixels nearing the end of its run.
